Title: Fully engage in the movement to increase production and to practice economy to set off a new upsurge in industrial production
Designer: Ha Qiongwen (哈琼文)Qian Daxin (钱大昕)Zhou Ruizhuang (周瑞庄)Yang Wenxiu (杨文绣)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Engineers and technicians take over the construction of industry again after the years of the Great Leap Forward.The poster consists of three sheets.
